items.sentence: Mary closed her eyes for a second and waited for Tom's kiss. When she opened her eyes, Tom was gone.
Even though Tom knew he\'d be teased about his height, he decided to try out for the basketball team.
I don\'t quite believe it when I hear someone claim they can speak more than five languages fluently.
I think it\'s unlikely that aliens similar to what we see in the movies have ever visited our planet.
She advised him to take a long holiday, so he immediately quit work and took a trip around the world.
